content: This was an excellent read… every single word. Parenting is a bitch. But like you said, “It’s the letting go that is the toughest part and the most necessary.” “Life is about being of service to others.” I can’t agree enough. Sometimes service is just being there. Listening, smiling… being silly. Connection is so very important to me, much more than actual things. People are truly simple beings. So many times if you look at unhappy people, it is because they overthink everything. Now is a great time. So glad to have you in my daily circle of life of the little important things! Friendship, music, sports, family!
